turns.answer: I am the Mafia. I own all the slaves who are running this world. I have all the keys and it is my turn to give you all the slaves to free you from my hands. And I can pay you a nice price.
turns.label: unknown

Question: Where are you between 3 and 8 am?

Answer: From 8 to 9 am.
